channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- Xcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- Xcode

item.title: CVE-2019-8722|2024-08-04T21:24:29.523Z -- apple -- xcode
item.description: Multiple issues in ld64 in the Xcode toolchains were addressed by updating to version ld64-507.4. This issue is fixed in Xcode 11.0. Compiling code without proper input validation could lead to arbitrary code execution with user privilege.

item.title: CVE-2019-8840|2024-08-04T21:31:37.420Z -- apple -- xcode
item.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking. This issue is fixed in Xcode 11.3. Compiling with untrusted sources may lead to arbitrary code execution with user privileges.

item.title: CVE-2019-8800|2024-08-04T21:31:37.487Z -- apple -- xcode
item.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation. This issue is fixed in Xcode 11.2. Processing a maliciously crafted file may lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-8724|2024-08-04T21:24:29.539Z -- apple -- xcode
item.description: Multiple issues in ld64 in the Xcode toolchains were addressed by updating to version ld64-507.4. This issue is fixed in Xcode 11.0. Compiling code without proper input validation could lead to arbitrary code execution with user privilege.
